title: For the
Impatient
label: D3 Tutorial
description: This tutorial is based on the book 'D3 for the Impatient', from Philipp K. Janert. It will walk through each chapter showings examples.

title: ntroduction
label: Chapter 01
description: D3 is a javascript library for manipulating Data Object Model (DOM) tree in order to represent information visualy. D3 uses the Selection API to do most of the things.

title: et's make some
graphs already
label: Chapter 02
description: This chapter will show how to plot a set of data for coordinates, and double sets (more than one axis). It will show as well how to add scales, and animate elements.

title: electing &
Binding
label: Chapter 03
description: You can easily bind data to produce an interactive and reactive visualization. With d3 you can bind data and use exit, merge, enter to select data and update it.

title: vents Interactivity
and Animation
label: Chapter 04
description: D3 allows you to handle events easily, we can explore in depth how to use mouse events, drag & drop and some othe data exploration techniques.

title: vents, Interactivity
and Animation
label: Chapter 04
description: You can easily track user events and create animations with the transition API. D3 allows you to handle events with ease and analize data with different input sources.
